column4: How can I disable all oss modules loaded and enable all of my alsa modules?
that should happen by default.  hotplug is loading oss modules ahead of alsa ones?
I get...Failed to load output plugin "alsa".  Trying defaults.
what sound card do you have?
What I'm really after is having my apps share sound or mix the sound
A refund on my sound card?  It's onboard.
so, you have the alsa modules loaded
if you "pkill esd", that program should work
I'm getting Can't find a suitable libao driver. (Is device in use?) when iI do `aoss mpg123  foo.mp3`  I've folowed the instructions up to that point.
Nothing is running that would be using it.
ignore aoss then, and just use aplay or something
